scripts.start: rm -rf dist && ng build --project video-angular-sdk --watch --configuration development & (wait-on dist && ng serve sample-app --host 0.0.0.0)
scripts.start:zoom: rm -rf dist && ng build --project video-angular-sdk --watch --configuration development & (wait-on dist && ng serve zoom-clone --host 0.0.0.0)
scripts.build: ng build --project video-angular-sdk && ng build --project sample-app && ng build --project zoom-clone
scripts.generate-docs: typedoc --options typedoc.json --exclude '!**/*(stream-video.module|video.service|device-manager.service|in-call-device-manager.service).ts' ./projects/video-angular-sdk/src/public-api.ts && replace-in-file '# Class: ' '# ' temp-docs/** && cp -r temp-docs/classes/ generated-docs && rm -r temp-docs
scripts.copy-docs: cp -a ../client/generated-docs/. docusaurus/docs/Angular/reference && cp -a ./generated-docs/. docusaurus/docs/Angular/reference && cp ../styling/docs/theming-and-css.mdx docusaurus/docs/Angular/ui-components
